welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Chorley, UK! Known for its charming villages and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal primarily serves low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Manchester Airport, with a wide range of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may have limited speed and data usage.
